A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There was something lacking... it was a soul with answers\, at least some. But there were none... too many unknowns make it seem like a long episode in a TV series\, rather than a stand alone movie which gives something to look forward to in the future. Cutting the umbilical cord with the Jedi past didn’t help either. However\, the action sequences were well done. Kylo\, Rey- who are you\, other than skilled Jedi swordspersons? Even Yoda looked campy. Some of the sequences made me think of being in a Disney ride! Yes\, Chewbacca pleased the vegans and the maltreatment of animals were portrayed... But there was something lacking- a soul...
